message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that could be extremely valuable for your business.  While I can't disclose details without a signed NDA, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount, as I'm confident you'll recognize its true potential.  Please let me know your decision.  I'm available to answer any questions you may have.
